channel.title: pre-commit Hooks on Documentation for kontrolilo
channel.description: Recent content in pre-commit Hooks on Documentation for kontrolilo

item.title: license-check-configuration-lint
item.description: What it does This hook lints configurations files as described. It checks for correctness and sorts the licenses.

item.title: license-check-gradle
item.description: What it does This hook checks the licenses of your gradle dependencies declared in a build.gradle against defined list of allowed open source licenses. More info gradle gradle-license-plugin

item.title: license-check-maven
item.description: What it does This hook checks the licenses of your maven dependencies declared in a pom.xml against defined list of allowed open source licenses. More info maven license-maven-plugin

item.title: license-check-npm
item.description: What it does This hook checks the licenses of your dependencies declared in a package.json against defined list of allowed open source licenses. More info npm license-checker

item.title: license-check-pipenv
item.description: What it does This hook checks the contents of a pipenv environment against a defined list of allowed open source licenses. More info pipenv pip-licenses
